title: Create Media Buy Request
description: Request parameters for creating a media buy

buyer_ref.description: Buyer's reference identifier for this media buy

brand_manifest.description: Brand information manifest serving as the namespace and identity for this media buy. Provides brand context, assets, and product catalog. Can be provided inline or as a URL reference to a hosted manifest. Can be cached and reused across multiple requests.

end_time.description: Campaign end date/time in ISO 8601 format

reporting_webhook.description: Optional webhook configuration for automated reporting delivery
